role.argrole: thing arg0 doesn't intend to do

example.parse: (IP-OBJ (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 法国)) (VP (VP (VV 支持) (NP-OBJ (NP-PN (NR 联合国)) (NP (PP (P 有关) (NP (NP-PN (NR 海地)) (NP (NN 问题)))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 决议)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 但)) (VP (VV 无意) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 参加) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 可能) (VP (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP-PN (NR 海地))) (VP (VV 进行) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 军事) (NN 干预)))))))))
